articles.title: Largest Naming Community
articles.description: Our unique approach allows you to receive an unmatched breadth of business name ideas from world's largest community of naming experts. With 75,000+ creatives and 15,000+ successful naming projects, Squadhelp is by far the largest naming platform across the globe.

articles.title: High Quality & Collaboration
articles.description: Using an advanced Quality Scoring Algorithm and Machine Learning, we ensure that you receive more ideas from our top-quality creatives, and Gamification best practices ensure two-way communication throughout your contest.

articles.title: Agency-Level Features
articles.description: Squadhelp's high end Audience Testing service allows you to poll your target demographics to get unbiased feedback on your favorite names. Also receive Trademark support from our team of Licensed Trademark Attorneys, so you can pick your name with confidence.
